usage_rules.background_strategy: Use #FEFAE0 (Cream) as the main background. Avoid pure white.
usage_rules.text_contrast: Use #283618 (Dark Green) for main text. Never use pure black.
usage_rules.gradients: No gradients. Use solid earth tones or subtle noise textures.

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the entire body to mimic recycled paper. opacity-5.
visual_enhancers.border_radius: rounded-xl for cards, rounded-full for buttons
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(0,0,0,0.04)] for hovering cards. Flat otherwise.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use bg-[#FEFAE0]/80 backdrop-blur-md for sticky headers.

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous. Section padding: py-20 or py-24. Component padding: p-6 or p-8.

grid_system.features: Bento grid style: mix of col-span-1 and col-span-2 items.

buttons.default: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-primary-foreground rounded-full px-8 py-3

cards.product: bg-white/50 backdrop-blur-sm border border-[#E9EDC9] hover:border-[#BC6C25]/50 transition-colors p-6 rounded-2xl group overflow-hidden relative

inputs.style: bg-white/50 border-[#E9EDC9] focus:border-[#BC6C25] focus:ring-[#BC6C25] rounded-lg p-3

motion.hover_effects: Slight lift (-translate-y-1) and shadow increase on hover.
motion.loading: Use a spinning sunflower icon or organic pulse effect.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use pure black (#000000) or pure white (#FFFFFF). Use the provided cream and dark green shades.
Ensure all buttons have a hover state that slightly changes lightness or scale.
Use distinct padding (p-8+) to create a luxurious, unhurried feel.
For the catalog, use high-quality images with 'object-cover' and rounded corners.
Navigation links should be simple text with an underline effect on hover (hover:underline decoration-2 underline-offset-4).
Use Lucide-React icons with stroke-width={1.5} for a refined look.

libraries.animations: framer-motion (for page transitions and scroll reveals)

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE tailwind.config.js with the colors provided in 'colors.palette'.
2. ADD the Google Fonts import to index.css.
3. APPLY the global background color (#FEFAE0) to the body in index.css.
4. CREATE a 'Layout' component that includes the Navbar and Footer, wrapping all pages.
5. USE the provided image URLs for the respective sections.
6. ENSURE the Admin Panel uses a denser layout but maintains the color scheme (maybe slightly lighter for readability).
